summary: After fifteen years of average married life and stifling in-laws, a businessman undergoes a midlife crisis and pursues his attractive young secretary.
cast: Pierre Étaix|Annie Fratellini|Nicole Calfan|Alain Janey|Ketty France|Louis Maïss|Jacqueline Rouillard|Renée Gardès|Billy Bourbon|Claude Massot|Micha Bayard|Jane Beretta|Magali Clément|Emile Coryn|Sylvie Delalande|Luc Delhumeau|Stéphanie Drobner|Jean-Pierre Elga|Odette Duc|Sandra Fratellini|Gino Fratellini|Tino Fratellini|Martine Leclerc|Mad Letty|Georges Loriot|Marie Marc|Paule Marin|Georges Montax|Georgina Pauwels|Judith Pauwels|Denise Péronne|Josette Poirier|Annie Savarin|Ralph Zavatta
title: El gran amor
